channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: 電子メールWaPoのニュースレター編集者エラナ・ザックは、ハリー王子がウィル・ルイス新CEOにハッキング隠蔽を手伝わせたという疑惑に関する記事にリンクしないようライターに要請した（Max Tani/Semafor）
item.description:
Max Tani / Semafor:
Email: WaPo newsletter editor Elana Zak asked writers not to link to a story on Prince Harry's allegations that new CEO Will Lewis helped with hacking coverups  —  The Scoop  —  A top Washington Post editor instructed editors Tuesday night not to promote a story about a controversy involving the paper's new CEO Will Lewis.

item.title: Pressフォワードのデール・アングリン初代ディレクターにクリーブランド財団での経験、ニュース・フィランソロピーが直面する課題などについてQ&A（Sophie Culpepper/Nieman Lab）
item.description:
Sophie Culpepper / Nieman Lab:
Q&A with Press Forward's inaugural director Dale Anglin on bringing her experience from Cleveland Foundation, challenges facing news philanthropy, and more  —  “I see, every week, some example of where the two don't understand each other.  Each of them needs to shift a little bit."

item.title: OpenAIのスカーレット・ヨハンソン騒動は、AIの運命共同体（manifest destiny）思想を思い出させるものに過ぎない：「これは、あなたが好むと好まざるとにかかわらず、起こっていることなのです。
item.description:
Charlie Warzel / The Atlantic:
OpenAI's Scarlett Johansson debacle is merely a reminder of AI's manifest destiny philosophy: “This is happening, whether you like it or not”, consent be damned  —  The Scarlett Johansson debacle is a microcosm of AI's raw deal: It's happening, and you can't stop it.

item.title: 武漢で開催されたCOVID-19の取材に関連した罪で4年間服役し、釈放されたと語る中国人ジャーナリスト、チャン・ツァンのビデオ声明（Huizhong Wu/Associated Press）。
item.description:
Huizhong Wu / Associated Press:
In a video statement, Chinese journalist Zhang Zhan says she was released from prison after serving four years for charges related to covering COVID-19 in Wuhan  —  Zhang Zhan was released from prison after serving four years for charges related to reporting on the COVID-19 outbreak in Wuhan …

item.title: プロパブリカ、2023年に5万4000人以上の寄付者から年間収入4500万ドルを達成、50州イニシアチブを通じた地方・地域報道の拡大にコミット（Joshua Benton/Nieman Lab）
item.description:
Joshua Benton / Nieman Lab:
ProPublica passed $45M in annual revenue from more than 54K donors in 2023 and commits to local and regional reporting expansion through its 50 State Initiative  —  With annual revenue of $45 million and a staff approaching 200 people, ProPublica has been one of the big journalism winners of the past decade.

item.title: AI新機能、検索の未来とパブリッシャーへの影響、YouTubeコンテンツ制作者への価値提供などについて、グーグルのスンダー・ピチャイ氏とQ&A（Nilay Patel/The Verge）
item.description:
Nilay Patel / The Verge:
Q&A with Google's Sundar Pichai about new AI features, the future of search and its impact on publishers, providing value for YouTube content creators, and more  —  The head of Google sat down with Decoder last week to talk about the biggest advancements in AI, the future of Google Search, and the fate of the web.

item.title: 音楽出版社とスポティファイが争う中、NMPAが著作権法を改正し、権利者にロイヤリティ交渉の選択肢を増やすよう議会に要請（Murray Stassen/Music Business Worldwide）
item.description:
Murray Stassen / Music Business Worldwide:
Amid a dispute between music publishers and Spotify, the NMPA asks Congress to change copyright law to give rights holders more options to negotiate royalties  —  The National Music Publishers Association (NMPA) has called on Congress to make a change to copyright law in the United States …

item.title: 広告主の信頼回復などの課題に直面するグーグルが、2023年11月から広告担当副社長兼GMを務めるヴィディヤ・スリニヴァサンのプロフィール（Robert Klara/Adweek）
item.description:
Robert Klara / Adweek:
A profile of Vidhya Srinivasan, Google's VP and GM of ads since November 2023, as the company faces challenges including restoring advertiser trust  —  She's fighting to rebuild advertiser trust and make sure Google stays ahead of the AI race  —  When she was a kid, Vidhya Srinivasan …

item.title: ジェネレーティブAI音楽スタートアップSunoがLightspeed Venture Partners、Nat Friedman、Daniel Gross、Matrix、Founder Collectiveなどから1億2500万ドルを調達（Michael Nuñez/VentureBeat）
item.description:
Michael Nuñez / VentureBeat:
Generative AI music startup Suno raised $125M from Lightspeed Venture Partners, Nat Friedman, Daniel Gross, Matrix, Founder Collective, and others  —  Suno, a trailblazing music AI startup, announced today that it has raised a staggering $125 million in its latest funding round …

item.title: グーグルは、さまざまな肌色や体型の買い物客に、服のアイテムがどのように見えるかを示す、AIを活用した新しい広告フォーマットを展開する（Louise Matsakis/Wired）
item.description:
Louise Matsakis / Wired:
Google is rolling out a new AI-powered ad format that shows shoppers how items of clothing would look on different skin tones and body types  —  A new breed of online ad allows brands to pay Google to offer shoppers AI-generated images that show how items of clothing would look on different skin tones and body types.

item.title: 新聞配達に課徴金を課す前に、USPSに業績目標の達成を義務付けるという米上院法案を推進する議員グループ（Sara Fischer/Axios）
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
A group of lawmakers push a US Senate bill that would require USPS to hit performance targets before imposing surcharges on the delivery of newspapers  —  - Newspapers previously relied on gig economy workers to distribute newspapers via their own vehicles early in the morning.

item.title: ピクサー、従業員の約14％にあたる175人を解雇 ピクサー史上最大のリストラ、ディズニー＋向けオリジナル番組の制作中止も計画（Thomas Buckley/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Thomas Buckley / Bloomberg:
Pixar lays off ~175 employees, or around 14% of its workforce, the biggest restructuring in Pixar's history, and plans to stop making original shows for Disney+  —  About 175 employees are getting layoff notices Tuesday, the company said.  —  The reductions reflect a decision to refocus Pixar …

item.title: ロシアの国営チャンネルRossiya24は、タッカー・カールソンの番組の数日前のエピソードをロシア語のナレーションで放送している（Allison Quinn/The Daily Beast）。
item.description:
Allison Quinn / The Daily Beast:
Russian state-run channel Rossiya24 is broadcasting days-old episodes of Tucker Carlson's show with a Russian voiceover  —  THEY'LL NEVER LET GO  —  Hilariously, the supposedly new program called “Tucker” is just days-old episodes of his show with a Russian voiceover.

item.title: グーグル、広告主の既存キャンペーンを活用したAIオーバービューで検索広告とショッピング広告のテストを計画、AIオーバービューは先週米国ユーザーにロールアウト（Paresh Dave/Wired）
item.description:
Paresh Dave / Wired:
Google plans to test search and shopping ads in its AI Overviews, drawing from advertisers' existing campaigns; AI Overviews rolled out to US users last week  —  Google is set to start mixing ads into its new AI-generated search answers.  It's a test of how the company's biggest revenue stream can adapt to the age of generative AI.

item.title: ジフ・デイビスのIGN、デジタルブランドGamesIndustry.bizやEurogamerを擁する英Gamer Networkを買収、一部スタッフを解雇（Christopher Dring/GamesIndustry.biz）
item.description:
Christopher Dring / GamesIndustry.biz:
Ziff Davis' IGN acquires the UK-based Gamer Network, which includes digital brands GamesIndustry.biz and Eurogamer, and lays off some staff  —  New owner makes redundancies across the Gamer Network portfolio  —  News by Christopher Dring Head of Games B2B
